title: Silver Shortsword
summaries: The Silver Shortsword is an early game metal shortsword. It is slightly weaker than its Tungsten version.

Like all shortswords, the Silver Shortsword has a very limited range and attacks with a stabbing motion at any direction on <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile</linked>, and horizontally in front of the player on <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console</linked>, <linked>3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked>, and <linked>[img:Legacy tModLoader version]</linked><linked> Legacy tModLoader</linked>, instead of an arc. This makes it almost useless against flying or jumping enemies, although its high attack rate makes it somewhat effective against weaker <linked>fighter</linked> type enemies.

Unless the player has a good reason to make the Shortsword (like not having very much <linked>Silver</linked>, or for completionist purposes) they are advised to make the <linked>Silver Broadsword</linked> as it does more damage and can swing in an arc.
